Posts.Content: Mar 15, 2013 11:55AM corgi09 wrote: I had 2 nodes with micromets, Onc score of 10.  Highly ER/PR+.  No chemo but heavy rads to the underarm after my masectomy and am now on Tamox.  Just finished my 1yr gauntlet of Dr visits and everything looks.....I was going to write good but will go with healthy.  Hope this helps

Posts.Title: CALLING ALL STAGE I SISTERS sheila888 MCBaker

Posts.Content: Dec 14, 2011 10:43PM corgi09 wrote: I'm new and mostly lurk.  I was diagnosed in early Oct., UMx on 11/28.  The pathology came back (besides the original tumor and "area of concern" from the MRI guided biopsy) with 8 other tumors/tumorlets  I have micromets in 2/3 nodes and am meeting my RO tomorrow.  I've already met with my MO.  I've given blood for menopause placement and will be getting the Oncotype report.  I don't know what I'm doing next and I'm so weary from the waiting and worrying.  This place is so wonderful cause I feel I can just be that here.

Posts.Content: Dec 24, 2011 11:11AM corgi09 wrote: I got really good news yesterday at my appt with my MO.  My Onctype came back at 10 so no chemo for me!  Rads will start in the new year and I have to pick up my Tamox. prescript (2 yrs then switch for the last 3.  2 indicators thru menopause, 2 indeterminate).  We talked about my next mammo and going straight to an MRI since all those 'false positives" weren't false in my case.  So good news for Christmas.  But I'm wondering does this feeling of waiting for the other shoe to drop go away?
